product_name: CHANELLE LIFT CREME Smooths - Firms - Illuminates
summary: SummaryA soft, comforting face cream that delivers targeted anti-aging benefits for a recontoured, toned and refined-looking complexion. With continued use, skin appears 25%* smoother, and facial contours appear 10%** more refined.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsBotanical alfalfa concentrate-a potent-yet-gentle naturally derived ingredient-firms and smooths the look of skin.*Instrumental evaluation of 31 women after 2 months of using LE LIFT CRÈME**Clinical evaluation of 31 women after 1 month of using LE LIFT CRÈMEItem 2560172How To UseApply morning and evening to face and neck, after LE LIFT CRÈME YEUX and LE LIFT SÉRUM.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Alcohol, Propanediol, Dimethicone, Lauroyl Lysine, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Ipomoea Batatas Root Extract, Faex (Yeast Extract), Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dipropylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Adenosine, Arginine, Lactic Acid, Phytic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopherol, Hydrochloric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Ci 14700 (Red 4), IL37A.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply morning and evening to face and neck, after LE LIFT CRÈME YEUX and LE LIFT SÉRUM.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Great product and really moisturizing my skin. Love to use it at night

reviews.headline: Awful smell
reviews.comments: I liked the consistency of the cream but the smell was so strong that it made me nauseous. I had to return it. I would buy again if they had a non-scent cream.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: It penetrates into the skin quickly. I've used it for one week and can already see a difference.  I'm 65 and I was starting to really show it!

reviews.headline: Absolutely the BEST!
reviews.comments: Treat yourself to this eye cream.  I have tried so many that leave your under eyes looking cakey or dry, or too hydrating where it becomes oily or sticky.  This perfectly absorbs into the skin and leaves the under eyes feeling hydrated and smooth.  I love prepping with this eye cream before I put my concealer on.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again…
reviews.comments:
Day and night… Smooth, no greasy, feel fresh, Smells good…
Love it…

reviews.headline: Highly recommend it!
reviews.comments: Got rid of my loose neck highly recommend.♥️♥️

rollup.name: LE LIFT CRÈME Smooths - Firms - Illuminates
